thread.title: BRIEF-Asure Software Announces $175 Mln Credit Facility

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Asure Software Announces $175 Mln Credit Facility
text:
April 2 (Reuters) - Asure Software Inc:
* ASURE SOFTWARE BOLSTERS BALANCE SHEET; ANNOUNCES $175 MILLION CREDIT FACILITY AND INCREASES SHELF REGISTRATION
* AMENDED CREDIT FACILITY ON MARCH 29, INCREASING TERM LOANS AND AMOUNT OF AVAILABLE FINANCING TO $175 MILLION
* TERM LOANS UNDER FACILITY ARE $105 MILLION, WHICH INCLUDES APPROXIMATELY $36.75 MILLION OF NEW DEBT
* FACILITY ALSO INCLUDES A $5 MILLION REVOLVER * AN ADDITIONAL $65 MILLION WILL BE AVAILABLE TO SUPPORT OUR CONTINUED GROWTH AND FUTURE ACQUISITIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
